answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
Below is a list of sample Mobile Phone Policies. 
Bellevue, WA
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302020/Mobile_Phone_Policy
City of Sugar Land, TX
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4373/Wireless_Telecommunications_Policy
 City of Beverly Hills, CA
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13924/City_of_Beverly_Hills_Cell_Phone_Procurement_Reimbursement_and_Use_Policy
City of Brentwood, TN
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301519/Employee_Cell_Phone_Allowance_Policy
I hope these help.
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Chinn Park MAGIC
text:
Hello,
The Management and Government Information Center in Prince William County, VA, would like examples of mobile device policies that you currently have in effect in your jurisdiction. 
Any assistance with this request will be greatly appreciated.
Thank you,
Karen Garrett
Management and Government Information Center
Chinn Park Regional Library
13065 Chinn Park Drive
Prince William, VA 22192
703-792-4880
703-792-4612 fax
magic2@pwcgov.org
title: Mobile device policies
